path.style: stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 10px; fill: url(#color-0); stroke: url(#color-1);

line.style: fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: url(#color-1);
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: url(#color-2);
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: url(#color-2);

polyline.style: stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; stroke: rgb(151, 0, 146); fill: url(#color-2);

line.style: stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; fill: none; stroke: url(#color-3);
stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; fill: none; stroke: url(#color-3);
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: url(#color-1);
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: url(#color-1);
